title: New: The Linedance Fever – Last Christmas (Wham Cover)
body:
Last time I counted there were 1,423,232,934 covers of _Last Christmas_ by **Wham**.

That’s one for every five people on the planet. Out of all those billions of versions of the 1984 shit-pop ‘classic’, this bluegrass take by Sweden’s **The Linedance Fever** may well be the best yet. The vocals are dark and delivered with meaning, and as a whole, it’s 50% bloody hilarious, 50% bloody brilliance. Just wait till it gets going; I wish I knew how to ‘jive’.
